name: Nighttime Adventure (HTML)
description:

Character courtesy of isaiah658 on OpenGameArt (https://opengameart.org/content/green-cap-character-16x18)

Enemy courtesy of Jerom on OpenGameArt (https://opengameart.org/content/gloo-enemy)

Music courtesy of 8bit Betty on Free Music Archive (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/8bit_Betty/too_bleep_to_bloop/hc152_04_spooky_loop_by_8bit_betty)
